title: Explain
body: How the actual hell. He was constantly jumping between 520 and 540

replies.body:
The maximum point in offense gives +3 armor and MR for each nearby enemy Champion. But that's maxed at 15 bonus - Malphite gains 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30% bonus from Armor and theres a mastery that gives him 10% bonus to bonus armor and MR so he could peak from 520 to 540 during fights.

If he's at 520 and walks in near enemy Champions he gains +3 armor and MR for each enemy Champion, couple this with his W giving him 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30% armor increase and the 10% from enchanted armor mastery and he could easily be gaining 15 armor from 5 enemy Champions increased by the 10% mastery and whatever rank his Brutal Strikes is (10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30%).
the jumping has happened ever since the adaptive armour mastery came out
it should be the mr jumping not the armor, and I tried it with same runes and masteries as him, with same items, still only got to 472 (lv 13)

they both jump with the adaptive armour mastery, or whatever truly causes that to happen, havent noticed it playing non tank champs when i wont have it, cos im too busy rekking kunts (language filter now?){{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:115}}
Hint trying it in a custom won't ever work, because of the mastery that gives Armor and MR per enemy champion nearby.

Welcome to malphite.

Frozen Heart: 90 armor
Thornmail: 100 armor
Ninja Tabi: 25 armor
Chain vest: 40 armor
Base armor: 84.5 armor (level 15 no runes/masteries)

Items and base armor: 339.5

Malphites W: Armor Increase: 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30%

Scaled: 441 Armor

Add runes and masteries into that and yeah.
he had 27 on runes and masteries
